member.name: IDWriteAsyncResult.GetResult
member.summary: Returns the result of the asynchronous operation. The return value is E_PENDING if the operation has not yet completed.
member.returns: Returns the result of the asynchronous operation. The return value is E_PENDING if the operation has not yet completed.

member.name: IDWriteAsyncResult.GetWaitHandle
member.summary: Returns a handle that can be used to wait for the asynchronous operation to complete. The handle remains valid until the interface is released.
member.returns: Returns a handle that can be used to wait for the asynchronous operation to complete. The handle remains valid until the interface is released.

member.name: IDWriteAsyncResult
member.summary: Represents the result of an asynchronous operation. A client can use the interface to wait for the operation to complete and to get the result.
